fullContent: Homeâ€º GirlLOL Surprise BB DriverBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenOutrageous Millennial Girls are going for a ride! L.O.L. Surprise! O.M.G. B.B. Driver is a 3D driving game where you steer the girls' cabriolet on the endless road. However, there are many dangers on the way!All you need to do is to navigate the vehicle throughout the way. Keep in mind that you cannot let the car crash with any obstacle in this girl game! Otherwise, you must restart from the beginning.ControlsDesktops and LaptopsA/D Keys or Left/Right Arrows: Steer the CarYou may also swipe the mouse from left to right.Mobile DevicesSwipe left or right to steer the car.About This GameJoin Neonlicious in L.O.L. Surprise! O.M.G. B.B. Driver, take the driver's seat for an exciting ride. On your journey, you will encounter potholes, pontoons, shopping bags, and gift packages.You need to overcome the obstacles one by one and gather the things that can benefit you. The traffic cones and holes can slow you down. Avoid contacting them and try to fulfill the task given to you at each level.Switch Between LanesYou are free to switch between three lanes on the road to dodge obstacles. The car will automatically start to move. Your job is to navigate it, overcoming obstacles along the way. Don't forget to collect the gift packages and shopping bags moving forward.There will be many cracks, traffic cones and plates before you. When you encounter any of them, maneuver your vehicle and avoid hitting them. If the battery bar of the vehicle in the upper left corner drops to zero, the game ends.Power-ups in L.O.L. Surprise! O.M.G. B.B. DriverThere are three power-ups that you can use to your benefit.Shields: They protect your car from damage for a short period.Magnets: They collect all the shopping bags and gift packages automatically.Blue Arrows: They recharge the electric vehicle's battery.I'm attempting to open the game, but it won't start. What shall I do?If you're using an ad blocker, turn it off. Alternatively, try opening the game in incognito mode. If these recommendations aren't enough, visit our support page.DeveloperM.G.A. developed this arcade game.What is More?Suppose you enjoy playing L.O.L. Surprise! O.M.G. B.B. Driver, you should definitely try playing L.O.L. Surprise! O.M.G. Style Studio. In the game, you will be the stylist of the Royal Bee, Neon Licious, Lady Diva, and Swag.For more fun, explore other online girl games on OnlineGames.io. We have dozens of free games for you to enjoy.
